name: Paradox (itch) (Startrix, ScottNickk)
description:
-Time Travel 2D puzzle platformer

Game is currently in early alpha

-Boxes still have bugs and are in the process of being fixed

-Game still needs polishing, more content, and more art

-Testing and feedback in the discussion boards would be helpful

-Hope you enjoy our game!

Created by: Jared Rothwell, Trevor Hodsdon, Aron Selimovic, Jasmine Johnson, and Scott Gassaway
